"The FUN Shop":
"The FUN Shop

Here you can use FUN points earned when logging in or communicating to purchase items.

Move your cursor vertically over the item list to choose the item, and left and right to change the quantity. Then you can pick the 'purchase' button to buy the item.

For more information, please refer to the Online Manual below:
<&URL pso2_players_manual_preparations_arkslobby_shoparea>"
